ygData.subject: Changig from Instruments to Weapons Hot Keys
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and well met, I am a 16th lvl bard on the E ci server and have a question for my fellow bards. 1.  How do you set up a hot key to switch from instruments
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and well met,

I am a 16th lvl bard on the E'ci server and have a question for my
fellow bards.

1. How do you set up a hot key to switch from
instruments to weapons.

I have tried this many times and I never seem to get it to work. The
closest I've come is a back pack slot in my hot key box but i still
need to go into inventory mode to grab and put away the weapon /
instrument. Im always afraid of dropping my Combine or shiny shield
when I do this. If any one can help it would be appreciated. This
List Rules..=) Thanks

best regards,

Lindros Battling Bard E'ci Server
Amber Order Member
